title: Team Lead
projects: Forensic tools giving visibility into fraud vectors across multiple segments of Apple - retail, applepay, network activity, expense reporting Dev-ops tool enabling engineers to create APIs
Manufacturing tools giving insight into yield count / parametric data
CMS/HR tools for employees and trainers enabling the scheduling, reserving  and content creation of classes
Manager/employee review process tool to give leadership insight into the review process and allow employees to manage their career development within Apple Inc.
responsibilities: Manage code, infrastructure and data
Mentor 1 to 3 junior developers / interns
Communicate to customers, partners and leadership globally
Ensure quality with testing and QA
Manage git repos, build process and continuous integration
Manage migration process across development environments
Design high level architectural diagrams and spec docs
Gather requirements and define project scopes
Review all pull requests
Submit and manage information security reviews
Manage 2 week sprint cycles with agile principles and tools
Manage documentation for any tribal knowledge
Organize and lead various presentations, meetings and demos
Organize and lead technical/behavior interviews
Create partnerships across teams for help and support
Manage integration of external APIs
Manage dev-ops and no-ops support and integration
Continuously manage expectations with leadership
